channel.title: jDownloader on Whonix
channel.description:
I installed jDownloader on Whonix, to download from some video sites (mainly Google Video). As it is installed on the Workstation, every traffic is routed over the gateway via TOR, or am I wrong?
Do I need to configure anything else in jDownloader to download anonymously via TOR?
tia!

item.title: jDownloader on Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Optionally (!) you can configure it to use an explicit Tor SocksPort for better stream isolation.

Whonix

Stream Isolation

Prevent Identity Correlation through Circuit Sharing by using Tor Stream Isolation

Read full topic

item.title: jDownloader on Whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

per default, everything is routed over the Tor network. However, I wouldnâ€™t recommend downloading bigger files over the Tor network, as this only creates massive server loads for those hosting relays, thus making the network slower for everyone using it. For things like these, a VPN might be a more reasonable solution.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
